product_name: The North Face Wrap-Ture Tunic Top - Women's
long_description: Made with dense cotton for warmth and a touch of stretch for everyday comfort, The North Face Wrap-Ture Tunic Top is the perfect cover-up when headed to the yoga studio. Cotton and spandex fabric feels soft against skin and won't restrict movement. Asymmetric zipper makes it easy to get into tunic and offers a nice touch of style. Open hand pockets shelter hands. Thumbholes help keep sleeves in place during stretches. The North Face Wrap-Ture Tunic Top features a loose fit.
short_description: Made with dense cotton for warmth and a touch of stretch for everyday comfort, The North Face Wrap-Ture Tunic Top is the perfect cover-up when headed to the yoga studio.
